comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: I believe the man is Frank Raye and not Cliff Edwards.

comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/23103743@N05]  --  agree. He might have borrowed Edwards' ukulele, but that ain't Cliff Edwards.

comment.author: 51986335@N02
comment._content: Thanks, swanq and Infrogmation -- you're right, this is must be Frank Raye. Cliff Edwards shows up with Betty Brewer and Frank Raye in the few photographs preceding and following this one (all taken on the boat). Good catch!
